message: Hi Bob, I have a product I think you'll be interested in. I'm asking $120 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $100 for it. Would that work for you?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $100 is my minimum, I'm willing to come down to $110 to make this work for both of us. Let me know if that's acceptable.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Unfortunately, I can't go above $100 for the product. Could we meet somewhere in the middle?
